amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer or release to the Republic of Yemen (or any entity within Yemen) a detainee who is or was held, detained, or otherwise in the custody of DOD on or after June 24, 2009, at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 179 (Roll no. 321).
